hero.headline: PHI Sanitization That Never Leaves Your Network
hero.tagline: Fully automatic redaction of protected health information from medical images, videos, audio, and documents—processed entirely at-source in under a minute to install.

features.sectionHeadline: One Solution for Every Medical Data Type
features.sectionSubheadline: Glendor PHI Sanitizer processes your entire data ecosystem—automatically, at-source, without templates or manual intervention.

items.title: Fully Automatic Processing
items.description: No tuning. No templates. No manual intervention. Glendor automatically identifies and redacts PHI across your medical data, eliminating the labor costs and bottlenecks that make manual de-identification impossible to scale.

items.title: At-Source Sanitization
items.description: Your medical data is sanitized on your premises or in your cloud—never transmitted to Glendor or any third party. Zero exposure means zero anxiety about where sensitive patient information might end up.

items.title: Multi-Modal, Multi-Format
items.description: Medical images, pathology slides, clinical reports, videos, photos, voice recordings—one solution handles them all. Stop stitching together point solutions for each data type.

items.title: Complete Pixel and Metadata Redaction
items.description: PHI hides in more places than pixels. Glendor sanitizes both visual content and embedded metadata in medical images, catching the sensitive information that visual-only solutions miss entirely.

items.title: 1-Minute Installation
items.description: Install and start processing in under a minute. Designed to integrate as a seamless node into your existing data workflows—or operate standalone. Minimal IT overhead, immediate time-to-value.

items.title: No BAA Required
items.description: Because your data never leaves your premises, no Business Associate Agreement with Glendor is necessary. Simplified procurement, reduced legal overhead, faster deployment.

items.title: Manual De-identification
items.description: Trained technicians. Months of work. Doesn't scale. With Glendor: fully automatic processing that scales without adding headcount.

items.title: Template-Based Solutions
items.description: Break the moment hardware or software settings change. With Glendor: works with unknown and varied medical data formats without configuration.

items.title: Third-Party Cloud Services
items.description: Your unredacted PHI travels to Google or Amazon before it's protected. With Glendor: data is sanitized at-source before it goes anywhere.

items.title: Complex Enterprise Deployments
items.description: Weeks of integration work, extensive IT resources. With Glendor: 1-minute installation, seamless workflow integration.

howItWorks.sectionHeadline: From Raw Medical Data to Research-Ready in Minutes
howItWorks.sectionSubheadline: Glendor integrates into your existing infrastructure and processes data where it lives.

steps.title: Install in Your Environment
steps.description: Deploy Glendor on your premises or in your cloud in under a minute. No complex configuration, no external dependencies.

steps.title: Connect to Your Data Workflow
steps.description: Integrate Glendor as a node in your existing data pipeline—or use it as a standalone tool. It adapts to your architecture.

steps.title: Automatic PHI Sanitization
steps.description: Medical images, videos, audio, documents flow through Glendor. PHI is automatically identified and redacted from pixels and metadata alike.

steps.title: Share, Research, Train AI
steps.description: Your sanitized data is ready for external collaboration, research partnerships, or AI model training—with zero exposure risk.
